cab.content: fThia Document is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty'^ Government.)119Operations,SECRET.FromGeneral Delme Radcliffe, Italy.To : -War OfficeReceived 5.40 p,m,November 15th 1917.682.Following from General Wilson. Begins:-W.7 November 15th. As far as I can see at present I shall require following staff for my office at Versailles.Major General, General Staff.5 Brigadier Generals, General Staff.3 General Staff Officers: 1st Grade.3 General Staff Officers: 2nd Grade. I recommend following officers to fill some of above appointments:-Brigadier General Sackville West to be Major General, General Staff.Brigadier General Ellington to be Brigadier General, General Staff.Brigadier General Studd to be Brigadier General, General Staff.Brigadier General P. De B. Radcliffe to be Brigadier General, General Staff.I am not able to give further details at present, but hopeabove will be agreed to as a beginning,Ends.
